d1_flags: 1. goto C69AC6 if GIYGAS_DEFEATED is set
d1_text:
Npc0011:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GIYGAS_DEFEATED L_C69AC6]
ï¿½Woof! Woof![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½(I'm Ruffini the dog.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm being possessed by the spirit of the game designer... (RUFF!)[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do you see the window showing HP and PP at the bottom of the screen?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½When you go to a store that has equippable items,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½this window will either flash, look normal or become black.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you are allowed to equip an item, and it is stronger than your current item,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½the window will flash.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If the item's power is equal to, or less than your current equipped item,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½the window looks normal.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you can't equip an item, the window is black.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½*Ruff*  I thought you'd like to know.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Now it's time to become a regular dog again...)[HALT][END]
